message:
This is a weird one I made as a proof of concept, because I've read several of his books. I embedded two of his biggest works as lorebooks to see how well he could explain the concepts within them, and it's decently accurate.
Russian anarchist writer and scientist Peter Kropotkin https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Peter_Kropotkin~9625cd0eb4e1a9a372bf9a9109991143.gz
